General.Name: Edenville Energy Plc
General.Description: Edenville Energy Plc engages in the exploration, development, and mining of energy commodities in Africa. The company primarily explores for coal. Its principal project is the Rukwa project located in Tanzania. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Aston House, London, United Kingdom, N3 1LF

1.Name: Mr. Rakesh Ramesh Patel BA(Hon)(Econ), CF, FCCA
1.Title: Company Accountant
